text: "Think" is a 1968 song by Aretha Franklin. It is the leading single from her 13th studio album Aretha Now and went to number 7 in the United States, number 32 in Germany, number 26 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in the Netherlands, number 4 in France, number 77 in Switzerland and number 6 in Canada. It was used in the 1980 movie The Blues Brothers. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Funk songs Category:Soul songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Adam Lambert songs
title: Think (Aretha Franklin song)
